channel.title: Your 4th
channel.description:
So guys, I've been gone for a few days :cool:
just want to know what you guys did for your 4th?
I went to my dads girlfriends parents yearly party, got completely slammed + was baked, we played volleyball, drank more, drank some more, did some karaoke, ate, drank more, made out with some chicks there, drank more and more, then did some fireworks, then drank more, and passed out on their front lawn with almost no clothes on (just socks and my pants + underwear[ofc])
was pretty epic, guess I was headbanging to my sharona and have it on video, need to get a copy :rolleyes:

item.title: Your 4th
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Interwebz is the place for me

Read full topic

item.title: Your 4th
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Woke up went out to eat, went and saw the last air bender, went out to eat after I got done with the movie(yes I had popcorn and soda at the movie, and yes it was 3D) went and chilled with my friends Will, Tiffany, Amanda, and Justin. Came home and started up the grill with my dad, after eating some burgers, we started setting off some firecrackers/bottle rockets, around night fall the big stuff started going off, at 11pm stuff got odd with me burning my hand, my arm, and firecrackers blowing up a few inches from my hand. I was soaked from the rain and rolling to get away from firecrackers.

To sum up that long text, I had fun.

Read full topic

I kinda just stayed at home this year. The only thing we did was go to a park where you can see the beach’s fireworks with a whole bunch of family friends. It was still pretty fun though.
